topics.body:
"@hype":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557b68ef6368727c0b000198#post_557b68ef6368727c0b000198
If was hilariously stupid incident.

Drinking on campus was a $15 fine; the guy in question only had two weeks left for his degree and ran out the front door past the police, got in his car and floored it.

"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557b69596368727ac2000276#post_557b69596368727ac2000276
The thing is though that you can't realistically make lying to have sex a crime cause:
A)Any justification for such a law would have to rely on religious reasoning thus it would be illegal to make such a law.
B)Any such law wouldn't have any legal foundation other than religious reasons.

You may disagree with us on the morality of the idea, but you can see why it would never happen though; in order for such a law to be created it would have to be a religious law.
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600

topics.body:
"@Thanotos Omega":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/557b63b363687228b4000d5d#post_557b63b363687228b4000d5d
Yes, lie about your beliefs (or whatever) to have sex with someone sure is a good reason to be put on a list that equates you with rapists. That's a fucking great idea. Actually, why don't we just execute them? Might just as well be the same anyway.

Unlike what SJWs try to tell you, sexual abuse is seen as a heavy crime and being put on such a list, even if only temporary, has a good chance of destroying your life.

topics.body:
So the TPP is officially dead.

Why was the trans-pacific partnership so controversial?  Basically Obama tried to shove in a bunch of ultra shady shit that wouldn't have passed normally. The way he tried to get it passed was that he metaphorically held economic support for displaced workers as a hostage.  It was so shady that both democrats and republicans were against it.

To dramatize it:
Obama, "Pass the TPP democrats or I shoot the hostage"
Republicans, "Don't listen to him"
Obama, "I swear I'll do it"
Democrats, "Better than letting you get away with it *shoots anyway*"

It's pretty much official; even the democrats are revolting against Obama.  Obama in his last year tried to fuck over the usa so democrats are rebelling against him.

Obama is now a completely do nothing president cause Democrats want to win 2016 so they've cut ties with Obama.
